title: Jetpack Joyride
description: Jetpack Joyride is a fast-paced endless runner where you join Barry Steakfries in an action-packed adventure through a high-tech lab. Dodge lasers, ride wild vehicles, and equip jetpacks to outsmart scientists. Customize your character, complete daring missions, and collect coins while navigating thrilling challenges. Itâ€™s a high-flying quest filled with gadgets, power-ups, and nonstop excitement.
